Header.title: My Equb
Header.paragraph: FOR RELIABLE, EFFICIENT, TRANSPARENT AND FUN MONEY SAVING !

About.paragraph: MyEqub is a mobile app that digitalizes the existing Eqqub system so that the system is reliable, efficient, private and transparent. It gives the opportunity to informal saving grops to join digital financial services in a way which is familiar to them.
Why: Provides secure way of randome winner slection.
Saves time, money and energy spent on contacting equb members.
Why2: Easy way to keep every transaction records.
